structure.unit: A JUSTICE AND PUBLIC SAFETY CABINET

law.catch_line: Inspection and reporting of secure juvenile detention facilities.

text.section: The Department of Juvenile Justice shall inspect, at least annually, each registered facility to assure its compliance with administrative regulations.
The Department of Juvenile Justice may require reports and other data at least annually from each facility.

law.history: Amended 2002 Ky. Acts ch. 257, sec. 5, effective July 15, 2002. -- Amended 1998 Ky. Acts ch. 443, sec. 4, effective July 15, 1998. -- Amended 1988 Ky. Acts ch. 350, sec. 133, effective April 10, 1988. -- Created 1986 Ky. Acts ch. 423, sec. 175, effective July 1, 1987.
